name: effect-sugar
description: Effect-TS syntactic sugar with for-comprehension style gen blocks

scripts.build: npm run build:plugin && npm run preprocess && npm run build:tsc
scripts.test: npm run test:plugin && npm run test:integration
scripts.package:all: mkdir -p target && npm run build:plugin && npm run build:vscode && npm run package:plugin && npm run package:ts-plugin && npm run package:vscode
scripts.release: npm run package:all && echo 'Artifacts ready in target/. Create release with: gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") target/*'
